Characteristics of Hangover Feeling of nausea, vomiting, headache, heightened senses, lethargy, dehydration and a sense of heaviness are some of the general characteristics of a hangover. Certain symptoms might vary from person to person. If people have a very low tolerance for alcohol they might also experience diarrheas, fevers and joint pains.
